document_data.caption: A collection of dolls.
document_data.name: Porcelain doll
document_data.mainbody: A '''porcelain doll''' was a type of [[doll]] crafted from the material known as [[porcelain]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Maniacal Manny]], an [[enchanter]] living in [[Procampur]], owned a menacing looking porcelain doll of a brown [[weasel]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/The Other Side of the Coin|16}}
* Some male merchants in the Realms collected and traded porcelain dolls in secrecy, as they were liable to face ridicule by their acquaintances or outrage from their wives over how much they spent on such dolls. Some rented out private locales to get together for 'swap meets', such as at the [[House of Twilight]] in [[Tantras]].<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2004)/05-17 - House of Twilight}}
